Description: Postcard; printed; photograph showing a detail of a painting from inside the tomb of Ramesses I in the Valley of the Kings.
Curator's comments: Postally unused but message written on the back, which reads: "Many thanks for sparing the time to talk to us about Lawrence. I will be in touch when I return from Cairo and hope I can come and see the Lawrence/Hogarth material".
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Tomb of Ramses I
